stats.starsTooltip: Total number of stars (favorites) the repository received on GitHub.
stats.forksTooltip: Number of repository copies (forks) created by other users.
stats.openIssuesTooltip: Number of issues (problems or requests) that are still open in the repository.
stats.closedIssuesTooltip: Total resolved issues, with resolution rate showing efficiency.
stats.codeChurnTooltip: Ratio between new code added and code removed/refactored. Indicates change quality.
stats.leadTimeTooltip: Average time between Pull Request creation and approval/merge. Indicates review process speed.
stats.divergenceTooltip: Percentage of PRs that received formal change requests (Request Changes).

health.title: Health Score
health.tooltip: Measures community health based on 7 open-source governance indicators

maturity.title: Engineering Maturity
maturity.tooltip: Checks for professional infrastructure presence: tests, CI/CD, linters and auditing

alert.title: Warning: Self-Merges Detected
alert.message: {{percentage}}% of PRs were merged by their own author. Consider implementing mandatory reviews to improve quality.

contributors.title: Contributions (Bus Factor)
contributors.tooltip: Assesses the risk of dependency on few contributors. High Bus Factor indicates vulnerability.

none.title: No Contributors
none.message: This repository has no analyzable contributors.

healthy.title: Low Bus Factor
healthy.message: Balanced team. No user concentrates more than 40% of commits.

warning.title: Moderate Bus Factor
warning.message: User <bold>{{contributor}}</bold> concentrates <bold>{{percentage}}%</bold> of the work. Consider diversifying contributions.

critical.title: Critical Bus Factor
critical.message: User <bold>{{contributor}}</bold> concentrates <bold>{{percentage}}%</bold> of the work. High dependency risk.

activity.title: Recent Activity
activity.tooltip: Latest commits and pull requests from the repository

noData.title: Flow data unavailable at the moment
noData.subtitle: GitHub is calculating statistics

techStack.title: Technology Stack
techStack.tooltip: Programming languages used in the repository

weekdays.title: Commits by Weekday (Sample: {{count}} commits)
weekdays.tooltip: Distribution of commits throughout the week. Helps identify team work patterns.

empty.title: No data found
empty.message: Make your first search to appear on the ranking!

settings.title: Configure GitHub Token
settings.description: Add your Personal Access Token to increase the limit from 60 to 5,000 requests/hour.
settings.warning: The token is saved only in your browser.

about.title: About Bisolhador
about.description: Bisolhador is an analytical tool for evaluating GitHub repositories like a Tech Lead. It analyzes volume, governance, maturity, and activity metrics to provide insights about project health and efficiency.

token.title: Why configure a Token?
token.description: Without a token, GitHub limits to 60 requests per hour. With a Personal Access Token, you can make up to 5,000 requests per hour, allowing more complete analyses.

warning.message: The token is saved only in your browser and is never sent to our servers. Your privacy is protected.

createToken.title: How to create a Token
steps: Give it a descriptive name (ex: "Bisolhador Analysis")
Select only the "public_repo" permission (for public repositories)

usage.title: How to use
steps: Enter the repository name in the format "owner/repo"
Explore the generated metrics and charts

error.title: Error Loading History
error.noData: No history found for this repository. Perform an analysis first!

benchmark.title: Repository Benchmark
benchmark.subtitle: Compare up to 10 repositories simultaneously and visualize metrics evolution
benchmark.emptyDescription: Add repositories using the search bar above to start comparing metrics
benchmark.partialError: {{count}} repository(ies) without history. Analyze them first on the search page.
benchmark.busFactorDescription: Work concentration on top contributor. Higher values indicate more risk.

alerts.alreadyAdded: This repository has already been added

share.errorNoData: Error: Data not saved. Try reloading the page.

snapshot.title: Historical Mode
snapshot.byDate: Viewing history from {{date}} (Semantic Snapshot). This data is static and does not reflect the current GitHub state.
snapshot.byId: Viewing record #{{id}}. This data is static and does not reflect the current GitHub state.

partialData.title: Partial data
partialData.message: Some information could not be loaded: {{items}}. Displayed data may be incomplete.
